translations: adj.（昆虫等动物的）外骨骼的

sentences.sentence: ReWalk, an exoskeletal version of the legs’ bones and muscles, and the pelvic girdle, has a more modest aim: to restore to the user the power and strength he has lost.
sentences.translation: “重新行走”，是腿部骨骼、肌肉和骨盆带的体外骨骼版，它的目标更为实际——恢复使用者失去的能力和力量。
